alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Cleveland; Grady; McClain; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 1:28AM CDT until June 01 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN GRADY...SOUTHWESTERN OKLAHOMA...CLEVELAND... SOUTHEASTERN CANADIAN AND NORTHWESTERN MCCLAIN COUNTIES... At 128 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oklahoma City to near Norman to near Washington, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...The Chickasha AWOS measured a 76 mph wind gust. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, Norman, Moore, Midwest City, Del City, Newcastle, Blanchard, Purcell, Mustang, Choctaw, Noble, Tuttle, Slaughterville, Spencer, Goldsby, Dibble, Valley Brook, Washington, Cole and Bridge Creek. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
